name: iProgrammer Solutions Private Ltd.
description:
Based in Pune, India, we were incorporated in 2007 with the objective of supporting companies and startups for their technology requirements (be it software, web or mobile apps ), having a team of 150 + professionals having experience in the mobile, digital and web industry. Our team comprises specialists in: Mobile Application Development, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Mobile Marketing, Ecommerce and Web development who are always motivated to do best in class work.
We have had an opportunity to work with more than 500 clients in India and abroad. Our Founders bring on board more than 40 years of business management, product development and marketing experience between them. They are also active Mentors to aspiring Entrepreneurs and Startups. Additionally, are also part of the angel investor community having participated in 8-10 investments in the past.
